titles.title: A bill to designate the headquarters building of the Department of Education in Washington, DC, as the Lyndon Baines Johnson Federal Building.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
1/23/2007--Introduced.
Designates the headquarters building of the Department of Education in Washington, DC, as the "Lyndon Baines Johnson Federal Building."
